channel.title: Astralpk.com | 24/7 | 317 | Custom items and more!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://astralpk.com/Astralpk.png[/img][/center] [B][size=18pt]Hello dear members.Server has been reborn,after a long time.The owners changed,but the same good content is the same.We had 170 players max,then due to economy and other reasons,we sadly closed.[/size][/B]
[B][size=14pt]No torva,no korasis,no newschool items.Old pi with a few customs- Coloured whips,dragon kite.Now u may say,eww,customs,forget that,im not joining.The whips,have effects like-They can barrage whip spec,poison,teleblock.Thats it.Dragon kite isn't really common item,so they're like dragon defenders but only they have big def bonuses.The xp and drop rates are quite big,so u will lvl up fast and get decent armour in a few hours.We are trying to get back our players,so please give it a try[/size][/B]
[LEFT]Client - [URL=http://"http://Astralpk.com/AstralpkClientnew.rar/"]here[/URL] Forums - [URL=http://"http://Astralpk.com/Forum/"]here[/URL]
We offer you:
-Stable economy. -24/7 Vps. -Good PvP Combat -Friendly staff members -Many bosses -Many minigames -Custom items -No lagg -100 % working Divine and Elysian effects -Normal drops + u got a small chance of getting a pvp armour/weapon. -Working Arcane stream,Sol -Chaotics,that aren't overpovered -Pkp shop, to gain Fire cape,Zerk ring, fighter hat and alot more -Artifacts,also gainable from Player killing,just bigger chance to get it. Sell those for cash.... -Donator shop with good benefits -Arma and Bandos bosses -Corp in the wilderness -Tormented demons -Slayer shop to obtain chaotics and slayer helmet -100% working ring of wealth -Fully working Void effects -Clue scrolls with 3rd age rewards -Theres more,just come and you'll see it yourself.[/LEFT]
[CENTER][IMG]http://Astralpk.com/pic/1.PNG[/img]

And more![/CENTER]

item.title: Astralpk.com | 24/7 | 317 | Custom items and more!
item.dc:creator: @astralpkv astralpkv
item.description:
@astralpkv wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:2, topic:469902”]I generally like your homepage, it’s okay I suppose. However if I was you I’d add a new font in, possibly try Lato from google.

Add into your body element in the CSS:

font-family: "Lato", sans-serif;

Then in your tag:

<link href="http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Lato" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css">

I’m sure that would look nice with your site theme.[/quote]

Very thanks.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I generally like your homepage, it’s okay I suppose. However if I was you I’d add a new font in, possibly try Lato from google.

Add into your body element in the CSS:

font-family: "Lato", sans-serif;

Then in your tag:

I’m sure that would look nice with your site theme.

[center][/center]
[size=18pt]Hello dear members.Server has been reborn,after a long time.The owners changed,but the same good content is the same.We had 170 players max,then due to economy and other reasons,we sadly closed.[/size]

[size=14pt]No torva,no korasis,no newschool items.Old pi with a few customs- Coloured whips,dragon kite.Now u may say,eww,customs,forget that,im not joining.The whips,have effects like-They can barrage whip spec,poison,teleblock.Thats it.Dragon kite isn’t really common item,so they’re like dragon defenders but only they have big def bonuses.The xp and drop rates are quite big,so u will lvl up fast and get decent armour in a few hours.We are trying to get back our players,so please give it a try[/size]

Forums - here
